member.name: NEWCPLINFO
member.summary: Contains resource information and an application-defined value for a dialog box supported by a Control Panel application.

member.name: NEWCPLINFO.dwSize
member.summary: The length of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: NEWCPLINFO.lData
member.summary: A pointer to data defined by the application. When the Control Panel sends the CPL_DBLCLK and CPL_STOP messages, it passes this value back to your application.

member.name: NEWCPLINFO.hIcon
member.summary: The identifier of the icon that represents the dialog box. This icon is intended to be displayed by the application that controls the Control Panel application.

member.name: NEWCPLINFO.szName
member.summary: A null-terminated string that contains the dialog box name. The name is intended to be displayed below the icon.

member.name: NEWCPLINFO.szInfo
member.summary: A null-terminated string containing the dialog box description. The description is intended to be displayed when the icon for the dialog box is selected.
